data.message: Don't care for the huge "floating" ads that now appear to the right of my timeline.  I understand why ads are needed, but if they are too big, they really distract from the timeline.  Can't they at least be minimized or made smaller somehow?

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Beverly! We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1rL53F5 -Sarah
I agree with this they are to big.
Yes they are 56% as wide as the wall... That's over the half of the Wall size and even worse, they are sticky to the scrolling...

I have epilepsy, and the flashing ads at the top and bottom of games could cause me to have a seizure.  I would like to be able to play without fear.  I understand the ads are needed to keep facebook free, but couldn't they be placed at either the top OR the bottom, so I (and others) could play without fear of seizures?
